data.title: Limited Hours and Selections
data.text:
Sugar Sweet Bakery has great cookies, brownies and cup cakes. The selection is very limited - small batches - so if you have your heart set on something specific - you may face disappointment as they run out quickly. They use quality ingredients and the presentation is perfection. Also, you can special order full cakes and other bakery items. But, and this is big - they have the most limited business hours of any bakery in Tucson. Seriously, I understand that times are tough, but only being open Friday, Saturday and Sunday limits the business. And the hours vary on those days. Perhaps being open from 10 to 6 on all three days would be a better and more consistent choice for customers? I now know to run over before 4 p.m. on Sunday, but I am sure that many potential customers show up at 5 p.m. and are turned away. 

So, if you happen to be in the area when the bakery is open, you will be delighted by the wonderful treats. If you happen by and find them closed and still need to satisfy your sweet tooth, try the ice cream next door at the Cashew Cow. Their hours are more realistic. Hope both of these independent small businesses can survive.

data.title: Look No Further for Cupcakes
data.text: Stopped in to try their cupcakes after reading many great reviews. My 8 year old daughter and I tried their red velvet cupcakes with cream cheese frosting. Loved every bite of it! My daughter didn't like it so much. I got to eat two delicious cupcakes instead. Friendly staff and very clean and modern interior. Next time we'll have to try their cookies.

data.title: Fantastic new bakery in Tucson
data.text: If you want fantastic cookies, cupcakes or cakes you've got to try the Sugar Sweet Bakery!  We've tried the German chocolate & the Banaoffie cupcakes and they were the best I've tasted anywhere.  We also had, the Turtle cookies & their Red Velvet cakes and they have all been wonderful.  They've recently debuted a carrot cake that just melted in our mouths.  Know that some of their menu changes daily so you may just have to go several times :-).

data.title: superlative
data.text: This is my new favorite bakery for superb cake, brownies and cookies. Inventive combinations & divine execution.  Switched a 30 year loyalty to Nadine's (bye bye N!)  upon trying my first slice of Chocolate cake at Sugar Sweet five months agol.  This is my go-to-top-choice for confections even tho it's a 15 mile drive to get there. The care that goes into the making is underscored by delightful customer service and the artistry in simply boxing a slice to go!!!   Can't wait to try a cupcake!

data.title: Great cookies.
data.text: I tried a variety of the cookies including: oatmeal blueberry, snicker doodle, and chocolate chip. All tasted fresh and delicious.

data.title: Nom, nom, nom!
data.text: Wonderful cookies and tasty lemonades. If the cookies and homemade lemonade are any indication of the cakes - I will be ordering one soon. This is a delightful place to stop in for a quick sugar fix. I've had the chocolate chip and funky monkey cookies and mango and strawberry lemonades - mmmmm! Cute store, friendly staff, yummy treats - it can't be beat!
